title: feat: new feature flag in windows crate
body:
`Windows::Win32::NetworkManagement::IpHelper::{IP_ADAPTER_ADDRESSES_LH, GetAdaptersAddresses}` and others are now behind a new feature (`Win32_NetworkManagement_Ndis`) as of [this commit](https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs/commit/7f2cd7cddbce30685edf822a1b0e02f0d0153bf5#diff-d1ab09ce83262d4c9e199e263119084ebf1cad945d2856b4fc964e4ecf1de0beR131-R132).
This enables the feature.

title: chore(deps): bump windows from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [windows](https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs) from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0.
Release notes

Sourced from windows's releases.

0.38.0

This release includes a host of small improvements and fixes to the windows crate. Notably, the windows-bindgen and windows-metadata crates have been rewritten to avoid the static winmd cache in favor of a stateful metadata reader that allows multiple instances to be used independently (#1777).

This release does not include an update to the windows-sys crate, which remains stable and unchanged.

What's Changed

  • Small clean ups to factory caching by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1758
  • Add WinSock conversion utilities by @​ryancerium in microsoft/windows-rs#1742
  • Set windows-implement min rust-version by @​wravery in microsoft/windows-rs#1773
  • Stateful metadata & bindgen by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1777
  • Pay back some technical debt by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1779
  • Remove nightly test distinction by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1778
  • Update Win32 metadata to v23 by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1783
  • Remove unused types by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1784
  • Remove hidden RawPtr type alias by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1791
  • Remove need for allocation inside Reader by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1794
  • Avoid redundant signature calculations by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1793
  • Improve Reader to Tree construction by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1797
  • Remove flatten comment by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1801
  • Test error propagation by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1803
  • Trim error messages by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1804
  • Remove reverse dependency from core module by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1802
  • Make Type methods simpler to use by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1806
  • Add cross compilation tests by @​riverar in microsoft/windows-rs#1808
  • Support COM-style query signatures with unconventional parameter positions by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1805
  • Avoid truncating error codes when converting from windows::core::Error to std::io::Error by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1809
  • Borrowed<'a, T> RFC by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1788
  • Use standard library algorithm for finding query parameters by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1810
  • Avoid string allocations in Cfg by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1812
  • Followup to event PR feedback by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1814
  • Basic metadata generation by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1820
  • Avoid UB in FactoryCache by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1829
  • Remove Xaml from windows crate by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1836
  • Include cfg dependencies for types with generic interface type dependencies by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1832
  • Add component helper function to simplify component development by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1840
  • Version 0.38.0 by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1841

New Contributors

  • @​ryancerium made their first contribution in microsoft/windows-rs#1742

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs/compare/0.37.0...0.38.0

Commits
  • 4c7ae6b Version 0.38.0
  • 6ec39ad Version 0.38.0 (#1841)
  • 0fafaed Add component helper function to simplify component development (#1840)
  • 6a3a748 Include cfg depedencies for types with generic interface type depedencies (#1...
  • b8d83c2 Remove Xaml from windows crate (#1836)
  • 1c720d8 Avoid UB in FactoryCache (#1829)
  • d3eee4a Basic metadata generation (#1820)
  • 22fc69d Minor improvements to windows::core::Event (#1814)
  • c7ebc24 Avoid string allocations in Cfg (#1812)
  • 11a2db2 rposition (#1810)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=windows&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.37.0&new-version=0.38.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: chore(deps): bump windows from 0.21.1 to 0.37.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [windows](https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs) from 0.21.1 to 0.37.0.
Release notes

Sourced from windows's releases.

0.37.0

This release includes a host of small improvements and fixes to the windows crate. Notably, changes to the implement and interface macros improve interoperability, correctness, and safety for COM and WinRT implementations.

This release does not include an update to the windows-sys crate, which remains stable and unchanged.

What's Changed

  • Avoid double allocation when passing strings via IntoParam by @​AronParker in microsoft/windows-rs#1713
  • Correct compose offset in implement macro by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1724
  • Restore nightly validation by @​riverar in microsoft/windows-rs#1726
  • Correct implementation identity for MBM and .NET compatibility by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1729
  • Fix interface macro to handle qualified IUnknown parent by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1732
  • Shorten IUnknown check by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1735
  • Improve IUnknown Unsafe Annotations by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1734
  • Improve the Interface trait by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1738
  • Improve Vtable implementations by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1740
  • Propose an RFCs Process by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1731
  • Add HSTRING compatibility testing by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1749
  • Simplify header handling in HSTRING by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1747
  • Use core::ptr::write for out params by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1750
  • Fix ToImpl by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1748
  • Inline HSTRING::clear into the Drop impl by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1752
  • Make cast method produced by implement macro unsafe by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1753
  • Improve ABI conversion by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1746
  • Add GUID::to_u128 by @​GamePad64 in microsoft/windows-rs#1756
  • Version 0.37.0 by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1765

New Contributors

  • @​AronParker made their first contribution in microsoft/windows-rs#1713
  • @​GamePad64 made their first contribution in microsoft/windows-rs#1756

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs/compare/0.36.1...0.37.0

0.36.1

This is a minor service release to work around docs.rs limitations in order to publish windows-sys docs.

What's Changed

  • Make target crates no_std by @​ChrisDenton in microsoft/windows-rs#1722
  • Version 0.36.1 by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1723

New Contributors

  • @​ChrisDenton made their first contribution in microsoft/windows-rs#1722

Full Changelog: https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs/compare/0.36.0...0.36.1

0.36.0

What's Changed

  • Avoid clearing SetLastError when allocating string params by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1665
  • Remove UB in the heap_string function by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1667
  • Add test component by @​kennykerr in microsoft/windows-rs#1666
  • Document heap functions by @​rylev in microsoft/windows-rs#1670

... (truncated)

Commits
  • See full diff in compare view

title: chore(deps): bump libc from 0.2.125 to 0.2.126

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [libc](https://github.com/rust-lang/libc) from 0.2.125 to 0.2.126.
Release notes

Sourced from libc's releases.

0.2.126

What's Changed

  • Update GitHub Actions actions/checkout@v2 to v3 by @​dtolnay in rust-lang/libc#2774
  • Remove FreeBSD 11 from CI by @​Amanieu in rust-lang/libc#2779
  • linux: add GRND_INSECURE constant by @​zx2c4 in rust-lang/libc#2743
  • haiku build fix by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2772
  • openbsd: constantify some arguments of openpty() and forkpty() by @​semarie in rust-lang/libc#2773
  • Enable aio_{read,write}v on FreeBSD by @​asomers in rust-lang/libc#2775
  • Enable sock_txtime on mips musl target by @​cww0614 in rust-lang/libc#2776
  • add malloc_usable_size for musl by @​jjl in rust-lang/libc#2777
  • Add ENOTSUP constant for riscv64 musl by @​nmeum in rust-lang/libc#2784
  • Add LIO_READV and LIO_WRITEV on FreeBSD by @​asomers in rust-lang/libc#2780
  • Fix definition of kevent.data on 32-bit FreeBSD 12+ by @​asomers in rust-lang/libc#2782
  • Add DragonFlyBSD kinfo_proc and kinfo_lwp structs by @​Freaky in rust-lang/libc#2783
  • Add OpenBSD kinfo_proc struct by @​Freaky in rust-lang/libc#2786
  • Add android x86_64 user struct by @​s1341 in rust-lang/libc#2748
  • Promote pthread_getname_np and pthread_setname_np from glibc to linux by @​colincross in rust-lang/libc#2768
  • Allow unused macro rules by @​Amanieu in rust-lang/libc#2790
  • Bump version to 0.2.126 by @​s1341 in rust-lang/libc#2789

New Contributors

  • @​dtolnay made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2774
  • @​zx2c4 made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2743
  • @​cww0614 made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2776
  • @​jjl made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2777
  • @​nmeum made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2784

  • cf1ccd8 Bump version to 0.2.126

  • 454fb0e Auto merge of #2748 - s1341:add_android_x86_64_user_struct, r=Amanieu
  • c3e4df1 Auto merge of #2786 - Freaky:openbsd_kinfo_proc, r=Amanieu
  • af887f0 Promote pthread_getname_np and pthread_setname_np from glibc to linux
  • ae7a8f8 Add OpenBSD kinfo_proc struct
  • b484a8d Move user struct into x86_64

body:
Bumps [libc](https://github.com/rust-lang/libc) from 0.2.124 to 0.2.125.
Release notes

Sourced from libc's releases.

0.2.125

What's Changed

  • Add OpenBSD's futex.h. by @​m-ou-se in rust-lang/libc#2761
  • Add DragonFly umtx_{sleep, wakeup}. by @​m-ou-se in rust-lang/libc#2763
  • Add NetBSD's FUTEX_* constants. by @​m-ou-se in rust-lang/libc#2762
  • Add pthread_mutexattr_setprotocol and pthread_mutexattr_getprotocol on Linux by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2731
  • Add unix adjtime support. by @​guyru in rust-lang/libc#2751
  • Add loongarch64 support by @​zhaixiaojuan in rust-lang/libc#2765
  • Add stpcpy, stpncpy, and strtok_r to unix by @​carbotaniuman in rust-lang/libc#2767
  • Add umtx_op to FreeBSD. by @​m-ou-se in rust-lang/libc#2770
  • haiku: improve platform compatibility by @​jessicah in rust-lang/libc#2769
  • Add riscv32 support for musl C library based linux platforms by @​kraj in rust-lang/libc#2540

New Contributors
